meta.label: Slack Conversation Formatter
meta.description: Formats Slack messages and thread replies into a structured conversation timeline suitable for LLM processing.

inputRoles.name: input_messages
inputRoles.label: Slack Messages Input
inputRoles.description: Dataset containing Slack messages (typically the output from the Slack Message Fetcher recipe)

params.name: aggregate_threads
params.label: Aggregate Thread Replies
params.description: Whether to aggregate thread replies with their parent messages.

params.name: format_by
params.label: Format Conversations By
params.description: How to group messages for formatting into conversation timelines.

params.name: group_by_channel
params.label: Also Group By Channel
params.description: When formatting by day, week, month, or all, also group conversations by channel within each group.

params.name: output_format
params.label: Output Format
params.description: Format of the conversation timeline output.

params.name: include_metadata
params.label: Include Message Metadata
params.description: Whether to include additional message metadata like timestamps and user information in the timeline.

params.name: exclude_subtypes
params.label: Message Subtypes to Exclude
params.description: Message subtypes to exclude from the conversation (e.g., channel joins, leaves, bot messages).

params.name: logging_level
params.label: Logging Level
params.description: The level of logging that the recipe generates.
